locks.name: Morph Ball Room Gray Lock (to Green Hill Zone)

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.devNote: Obstacle can be destroyed either going 1 -> 6 or 6 -> 1.

locks.devNote: Technically this yields f_ZebesAwake, although it requires the same flag to spawn the enemies, so it's not possible here.

nodes.name: Right Item
devNote: This item is technically no longer spawned after Zebes is awake, which would require canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess.
The logic here is not modeling that, as that bug is likely not going to be kept by anyone that utilizes this data.

locks.name: Blue Brinstar Power Bombs Spawn Lock
locks.note: Item doesn't appear before Zebes is awakened.

strats.name: Leave With Side Platform
devNote: Using the full runway, this requires a last-frame jump, followed by a 2-frame window for the morph.

strats.name: Free Passage
strats.devNote: The obstacle isn't really cleared, but should enable all strats that require it to be.

strats.name: Quick Sidehopper Kill
note: For the Power Bomb and Screw Attack kills, this strat assumes you don't know you're entering the room beforehand.
If you know, it's possible to Power Bomb kill the first two Sidehoppers damage-free by morphing before entering.
For Screw, just entering with a spin jump would work.

strats.name: Prepared Kill on Entry
note: Enter the room ready to kill the hoppers before they can hit Samus.
Enter with a Charged Plasma shot ready, in a Screw Attack spin jump, or prepated to rapidly kill the hopper with Plasma and another beam.

strats.name: Prepared Kill on Entry, Morph Entry
note: Roll into the room, fall off the step and roll into the corner.
Either use a Power Bomb on entry, or unmorph at the bottom of the step and quickly kill the hoppers with Plasma.

strats.name: Prepared Missile and Super Kill
note: Enter the room and immediately shoot a Missile and a Super to kill the first hopper.
Quickly kill the second the same way or safely kill it with morph.

strats.name: Prepared Missile and Super Kill (First Hopper)
strats.note: Enter the room and immediately shoot a Missile and a Super to kill the first hopper.
strats.devNote: This can then be paired with quickly leaving the room normally or with a G-Mode setup, if the door is unlocked.

strats.name: Pause Abuse Pseudo Screw Sidehopper Kill
note: Pseudo Screw the first ground hopper and focus fire on it until it dies while taking 2-3 hits.
Kill the ceiling hopper while on the ground, crouched near the stair for some safety, or with Morph without risk.
The third hopper can be killed with another Pseudo Screw with pause abuse, a Morph dodge, or a dodge by jumping over it while it lunges towards Samus.

strats.name: Mockball Entry, Tank Hit
strats.note: Tank a hit or use a pause abuse with a reserve refill.

strats.name: Mockball Entry, Quick Kill
strats.note: Unmorph and quickly kill the hoppers on entry.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Sidehopper
R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: Due to R-Mode Entry, getting hit by the Sidehopper can only be avoided by a quick Screw Attack after releasing the X-Ray Scope.
You can attempt to farm the two ground Sidehoppers for Reserve Energy. Otherwise, you must use a Crystal Flash.
Leave the ceiling Sidehopper alive to clear the runway for a shortcharge.
Initiate the shinespark in midair so that Samus is in the path to be hit.
devNote: FIXME: More equipment combinations can work.

strats.name: Diagonal Spark on Entry
strats.note: Spark diagonally immediately on entry to kill the first two sidehoppers, then carefully kill the third.

strats.name: Use Flash Suit, Diagonal Spark on Entry
strats.note: Spark diagonally immediately on entry to kill the first two sidehoppers, then carefully kill the third.

strats.name: Power Bomb Sidehopper Kill and Bomb Blocks
note: This strat assumes you don't know you're entering the room beforehand. Otherwise, it's possible to kill the first two Sidehoppers without taking damage.
It's possible to break the bomb blocks alongside the third Sidehopper without taking an additional hit with a mockball.
strats.devNote: FIXME: There are missing Power Bomb strats that enter the room with a mockball.

strats.name: Pause Abuse, Morph Slow Sidehopper Kill
Pause Abuse Slow Sidehopper Kill, Morphless
strats.note: To save a hit, jump over the third Sidehopper as it lunges towards Samus.

strats.name: R-Mode Crystal Flash Interrupt
note: Immediately on room entry, the Sidehopper is going to hit Samus. Afterwards, quickly roll to the right next to the stair.
It is required to avoid double hitting the Sidehopper with the Power Bomb or it will die.
It can help to place a Power Bomb and roll to the right to reduce the chance that the ceiling hopper gets double hit, and to lure the third hopper.
Quickly getting back into position and Crystal Flashing will usually get Samus hit by either the ceiling or right hopper.
devNote: Killing the hoppers after this is easy, as Samus will have i-frames, the Sidehoppers will be injured, and Samus will have some extra ammo just in case.
A different setup could also break A, but Samus will end with at least 10 Power Bombs, so this is ignored for simplicity.

strats.name: Direct G-mode Morph, Crystal Flash Interrupt
note: On entry, quickly roll to the right next to the stair, while Samus is protected with i-frames.
It is required to avoid double hitting the Sidehopper with the Power Bomb or it will die.
It can help to place a Power Bomb and roll to the right to reduce the chance that the ceiling hopper gets double hit, and to lure the third hopper.
Quickly getting back into position and Crystal Flashing will usually get Samus hit by either the ceiling or right hopper.
devNote: Killing the hoppers after this is easy, as Samus will have i-frames, the Sidehoppers will be injured, and Samus will have some extra ammo just in case.
A different setup could also break A, but Samus will end with at least 10 Power Bombs, so this is ignored for simplicity.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph Remote Acquire with Blue Suit
note: Enter with direct G-mode artificial morph, and hold right to roll through the bomb blocks using a blue suit.
Touch the item, and return to the left side of the room before exiting G-mode to collect the item.

strats.name: Speedball (Left to Right)
note: It's a short charge into a speedball to break the bomb blocks.
The Sidehoppers need to be destroyed beforehand to clear the running space.

strats.name: Room Entry Speedball
devNote: This is a direct link because clearing the hoppers is unnecessary.
One tile is subtracted from the runway length since Samus must be blue before contacting the first Hopper.
There is 1 unusable tile in this runway.

strats.name: Morph Entry, Precise Dodge
note: Roll into the room, fall off the step and roll into the corner.
Roll to the right immediately as the floor hopper is going to take its second jump to get it off camera.
Once it is off camera, stop and wait for the next hopper to jump towards Samus, then roll under it as it jumps again.

strats.name: Mockball Entry, Precise Dodge
note: Roll into the room, fall off the step and roll into the corner.
Roll to the right immediately as the floor hopper is going to take its second jump to get it off camera.
Once it is off camera, stop and wait for the next hopper to jump towards Samus, then roll under it as it jumps again.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs Zebes Asleep
strats.note: Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Overload PLMs Zebes Asleep, Power Bomb Wall
note: Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.
Place a Power Bomb next to the right wall then quickly exit G-mode before it explodes to destroy the blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph with Blue Suit, Power Bomb Wall
strats.note: Place a Power Bomb next to the right wall then quickly exit G-mode before it explodes to destroy the blocks.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Overload PLMs
note: Either kill the Sidehoppers immediately on entry by placing a Power Bomb while rolling off the stair, dodge them multiple times, or tank their hits.
If Samus has Morph Ball, it is also possible to kill the Sidehoppers upon room entry with Screw Attack or a powerful beam.
Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.
Roll under the last Sidehopper and through the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Overload PLMs, Power Bomb Wall
note: Either kill the Sidehoppers immediately on entry by placing a Power Bomb while rolling off the stair, dodge them multiple times, or tank their hits.
If Samus has Morph Ball, it is also possible to kill the Sidehoppers upon room entry with Screw Attack or a powerful beam.
Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.
Roll under the last Sidehopper and through the bomb blocks.
Place a Power Bomb next to the right wall then quickly exit G-mode before it explodes to destroy the blocks.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Overload PLMs
note: Tank the Sidehopper hits or kill them after a single hit by quickly placing a Power Bomb.
It is also possible to kill the Sidehoppers with a very fast Screw Attack, if Samus has Morph Ball.
Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.
Roll under the last Sidehopper and through the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Overload PLMs, Power Bomb Wall
note: Tank the Sidehopper hits or kill them after a single hit by quickly placing a Power Bomb.
It is also possible to kill the Sidehoppers with a very fast Screw Attack, if Samus has Morph Ball.
Overload the PLMs by rolling through the camera scroll blocks which are 4 tiles to the right of the stair by the door.
Roll under the last Sidehopper and through the bomb blocks.
Place a Power Bomb next to the right wall then quickly exit G-mode before it explodes to destroy the blocks.

strats.name: Carry G-Mode Back Up the Elevator
R-Mode Crystal Flash Interrupt
note: Cross the room then lure and kill the two floor Sidehoppers using the morph tunnel.
With the ceiling Sidehopper in the top right corner, quickly roll to the left next to the stair.
It is required to avoid double hitting the Sidehopper with the Power Bomb or it will die.
Place a Power Bomb, Wait a second, then roll to the right to lure the hopper and quickly return and Crystal Flash.
Waiting briefly will prevent the hopper from coming too soon and getting double hit.

strats.name: R-Mode Spark Interrupt
note: The hoppers have a poor energy drop rate. The rightmost two can be killed easily for two chances at a drop,
otherwise a Crystal Flash must be used to get reserves.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Power Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Place the Power Bomb, then exit g-mode before the bomb goes off.

strats.name: Blocks Already Broken
strats.note: Kill the ground hoppers by shooting through the morph tunnel, then roll through to the left door.

strats.name: Speedball (Right to Left)
note: It's a short charge into a speedball to break the Bomb Blocks.
The Power Bomb Blocks need to be destroyed to have enough running room.
The sidehoppers that remain can be killed safely using the morph tunnel.

strats.name: Safe Sidehopper Kill
strats.note: The SideHoppers can be killed safely from behind with Power Beam.
strats.devNote: Killing the ceiling hopper is the only one that's not free. Killing the bottom two and leaving the left door is accounted for elsewhere.
